info_embed.desc:
**OweenBot** is a multipurpose Discord bot with games, economy, and social features!

**Features:**
ğŸ° **Casino Games** - Blackjack, Roulette, Slots, Coinflip
ğŸ’° **Economy System** - Earn and spend MantiCoins
â¤ï¸ **Social Interactions** - Fun commands to interact with friends
ğŸ† **Leaderboards** - Compete with others globally or per server
ğŸ® **Valorant** - Random agent selector

**MantiCoins System:**
â€¢ Each server has its own independent economy
â€¢ Earn coins through social commands and daily rewards
â€¢ Use coins to play casino games and win big!
â€¢ Global and server-specific leaderboards

**Support:**
Need help? Use `/help` to see all commands!
Join our support server: [Discord](https://discord.gg/3rE9PRH95y)
